revision.text: ==English== ===Etymology=== From the instrument's original German name, {{m|de|Xänorphika}}. ===Noun=== {{en-noun|!}} # {{lb|en|musical instruments}} A little-known [[stringed instrument]] with a [[keyboard]], invented by Carl Leopold Röllig in 1801. #* '''1895''', Otto Ebel, ''Handbook of Music'', Arthur P. Schmidt, page 212 #*: '''Xaenorphica'''. A bow stringed instrument with a Keyboard, invented by Röllig, 1801, the sounds of which were produced by bows set in motion by a pedal. [[Category:en:String instruments]]
